|brand = Synology |model = RackStation |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = RS812 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 08-04ARM4214 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5<!-- TE --> |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;ST25P32V6P; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ1G83DFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.12;;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, eSATA, USB 2.0 (Type A) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 5 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, eSATA, Link Aggregation, SNMP, buzzer, fan, heatsink, metal case |addchip = I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, 4-port SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F627A;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 28V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4524C;;6;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2026-2YM;;1;,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4032V;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822108093 |asin = B0061JPX7Y |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC}} ==Overview== It's a 4-bay 1U Rackmount NAS. This device has 2x USB 2.0 and 1x eSATA ports. *"P/N:08-04ARM4214", "Model:ARM42L2" and "Ver:V1.4" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|Synology RackStation RS816|List of NAS Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.6GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM V5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4MB SPI NOR Flash, 4x SATA II, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: ~100-240V, 5A via C13
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.alphr.com/synology/synology-rackstation-rs812/31670/synology-rackstation-rs812-review/ ''Synology RackStation RS812 review'' on '''alphr'''] (Jan. 2012)
